sentence: Adapted by Altman and Sam Shepard for The Cannon Group from the latter's Pulitzer Prize -nominated play, Fool for Love (1985) featured the playwright-actor alongside Kim Basinger, Harry Dean Stanton and Randy Quaid; it fared better than most of his films from the era, earning $ 900,000 domestically on a $ 2 million budget and positive reviews from Roger Ebert and Vincent Canby.
